data.name: ProgramHeader
data.value: xcSync v{0}, (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
data.comment: {0} is a numerical based string containing the version number for the command line tool

data.name: Options.Open.Description
data.value: Open the generated project in Xcode

data.name: Commands.Generate.Description
data.value: generate a Xcode project at the path specified by --target from the project identified by --project

data.name: Commands.Sync.Description
data.value: used after the generate command to synchronize changes from the generated Xcode project back to the .NET project

data.name: Commands.Watch.Description
data.value: syncs changes between the .NET project and Xcode project automatically

data.name: Errors.InvalidOption
data.comment: {0} is name of the command line options, {1} is the value of the option provided by the user

data.name: Errors.MultipleProjectFilesFound
data.value: Multiple .csproj files found in current directory. Specify which project to using the --project parameter.

data.name: Errors.Validation.PathDoesNotExist
data.comment: {0} is the path to the file or directory

data.name: Errors.Validation.PathIsNotEmpty
data.comment: {0} is the path to the file or directory

data.name: Errors.Validation.PathDoesNotContainCsproj
data.value: Path '{0}' does not contain a C# project
data.comment: {0} is the path to the file or directory

data.name: Errors.Validation.MissingValidTargetFrameworkInPath
data.comment: {0} is the path to the file or directory

data.name: Errors.Validation.InvalidTargetFrameworkInCsproj
data.comment: {0} is name of the target frameworks, e.g net8-ios, net8-windows

data.name: Errors.MultipleTfmsFound
data.value: Multiple target frameworks found in the project file. Specify which target framework to use using the --tfm parameter.

data.name: Errors.TfmNotSupported
data.value: Target framework passed in is not supported by current .NET project.

data.name: Generate.HeaderInformation
data.value: Generating files from project '{0}' to target '{1}'
data.comment: {0} is the path to the project file, {1} is the path to the target project

data.name: Sync.HeaderInformation
data.value: Syncing files from project '{0}' to target '{1}'
data.comment: {0} is the path to the project file, {1} is the path to the target project

data.name: Watch.HeaderInformation
data.comment: {0} is the path to the project file, {1} is the path to the target project
